What method was used for the synthesis of [Zn2(tpa)2(cpb)]·2DMF·H2O?
data.answer: Heating a mixture of Zn(NO3)2·6H2O, terephthalic acid (H2tpa), and 1-(4-carboxyphenyl)-4,4'-bipyridinium hexafluorophosphate (Hcpb·PF6) in DMF at 120°C for 48 hours.
